div.div: Mary Hardin-Baylor vs. East Texas Baptist

tr.td: ETBU wins coin toss and defers. UMHB will receive.
Cory McNeil kickoff 42 yards to the UMHB23, Stephen Salinas return 28 yards to the ETBU49 (Cory McNeil).
LiDarral Bailey pass incomplete to Geoff Myles (Alex Cloudy).
LiDarral Bailey pass complete to Geoff Myles for 5 yards to the ETBU44 (Alex Cloudy), PENALTY UMHB holding (Caleb Moore) 10 yards to the UMHB41, NO PLAY.
